name: Virulence: Breath of the vile
description:
Virulence : Breath of the vile, is a 2D top down infectionem-up game , where the player will explore the human body as a virus species and infect other cells in order to survive. The player can control an individual virus or replicate and control a larger group.

They can gain abilities which allow them to survive in the human body. Vital organs act as the main dungeons that the virus needs to infiltrate and conquer, the interconnecting region of the body are the overworld.

This demo comprises of the stomach dungeon with the core gameplay.
